channel.title: rust on Hexgolems
channel.description: Recent content in rust on Hexgolems

item.title: Nautilus 2.0
item.description: Release of Nautilus 2.0 with many new features

item.title: gdb_probe.rs
item.description: Spawn a dynamic debugger from your application like ipdb.set_trace() / binding.pry, but in Rust.

item.title: HexTD
item.description: A deck building tower defense game written in Rust.

item.title: Nautilus - Fuzzing with Grammars
item.description: An AFL style feedback fuzzer, that uses grammars to find more bugs. Written in Rust and published at NDSS 2019

item.title: Interval Tree
item.description: A very efficient data structure to query ranges for Rust. Useful to implement analysis passes on memory/code/firmware dumps.

item.title: Loaded Dice
item.description: Sample from discrete distributions in O(1). Very useful when building randomized generators and fuzzer in Rust.
